minecraftxiv.config.title: Minecraft XIV
minecraftxiv.config.scrollWheelZoom.name: Scroll wheel zoom
minecraftxiv.config.scrollWheelZoom.desc: Zoom with scroll wheel (overrides hotbar scrolling).
minecraftxiv.config.movementCameraRelati: When movement should be interpreted as relative to the camera instead of the player.
minecraftxiv.config.lockOnTargeting.name: Lock-on targeting
minecraftxiv.config.lockOnTargeting.desc: Cycle through mobs with a keybind. Locked-on mobs override cursor targeting.
minecraftxiv.config.capabilities:
Additional features that aren't vanilla server friendly.
Â§eThese must be allowed by the server operator. On local worlds, commands must be enabled.
Toggles if this feature is allowed on the server.
minecraftxiv.config.targetFromCamera.des: Pick target from cursor position, bypassing player line of sight.
minecraftxiv.config.unlimitedReach.name: Unlimited reach
minecraftxiv.config.unlimitedReach.descr: Allow interaction with blocks no matter how far from the player they are.
minecraftxiv.config.experimental: Features that aren't ready for official release yet. These may be buggy or incomplete!
minecraftxiv.config.experimental.moveMod: A toggleable mode designed for use with player-relative movement. When enabled, the mouse cursor will target a point on a horizontal plane through the player's head, ignoring entities and blocks.
minecraftxiv.config.experimental.project:
Method for aiming projectiles when locked onto an enemy.
None: Normal targeting, same as without lock-on.
Legacy: Always aim directly toward the enemy's head (same as normal lock-on).
Camera Plane: Target a point on a plane facing the camera that passes through the enemy's head
Vertical Plane: Target a point on a vertical plane that faces the camera on horizontal axes and passes through the enemy's head.
